Subclasses are alternative classes for your main character
At least one subclass is also needed to access the Noblesse quest line

You can acquire subclasses by completing the quest line 'Fates Whisper' and 'Mimir's Elixir'
Subclasses can be trained up to level 85
Sub skills and transformations are removed from the game
You can happily play your subclass as if it were your main, except for being able to participate in Olympiad

Good luck!
